context_bundle.summary: PostgreSQL optimization: Indexing (B-Tree, partial, GIN for JSONB, covering), query optimization (avoid SELECT *, functions on indexed columns, UNION ALL vs UNION), partitioning (RANGE, HASH), materialized views (cache aggregations, 1000x speedup). EXPLAIN ANALYZE for execution plans. Connection pooling (pgbouncer). Migrations: Flyway (SQL), Liquibase (XML/YAML). Performance: partial indexes 275x improvement, partitioning 10-100x, proper indexing 400x.

onboarding.quick_start: Postgres optimization: Create indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_users_email ON users(email), partial: WHERE is_active=true. Avoid SELECT *, use specific columns. UNION ALL instead of UNION. Partitioning: PARTITION BY RANGE (created_at), partitions for year/month. Materialized view: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW daily_summary AS SELECT..., REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW. EXPLAIN ANALYZE to check execution plans (look for Seq Scan -> Index Scan). Connection pool: pgbouncer, max_connections=100. Migrations: Flyway V1__Create_users.sql or Liquibase XML changesets. Performance: indexes 400x, partial indexes 275x, partitioning 100x.
common_patterns: B-Tree index: CREATE INDEX idx_users_email ON users(email)
Composite index: CREATE INDEX idx_email_created ON users(email, created_at)
Partial index: CREATE INDEX idx_active ON users(email) WHERE is_active=true
Covering index: CREATE INDEX idx_covering ON users(email) INCLUDE (username, created_at)
GIN JSONB: CREATE INDEX idx_metadata ON users USING GIN (metadata)
Avoid SELECT *: SELECT id, email FROM users instead of SELECT *
Avoid functions on indexes: WHERE created_at >= '2024-01-01' not WHERE YEAR(created_at)=2024
Partitioning: PARTITION BY RANGE (created_at), CREATE TABLE orders_2024 PARTITION OF orders
Materialized view: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW summary AS SELECT..., REFRESH CONCURRENTLY
EXPLAIN ANALYZE: check execution plan, Seq Scan bad, Index Scan good
